title-group.article-title: Aspects of Social Work on a Cancer Research and Treatment Unit in a London Teaching Hospital

abstract.p: With the rapid growth of technology and science in society today, an increasingly large number of people are becoming patients in specialized research and treatment units. The reorganization of social work support to the health service is upon us, and great care must be taken to ensure that this important group of clients will receive the social work help it needs. The paper is based on work in a cancer unit in a London teaching hospital and seeks to illustrate ways in which the work is specialized.
